pages.text: $(italic)Your tools with this enchantment seem to dissolve all things they mine into thin air. Broken down into the finest sand and blown away by the wind.$(br2)For this one time, however, when you want to knock half a city out of rough stone, it might even come in handy. Some things are probably curse and blessing at the same time.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Destroys the drops of all broken blocks.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Curse of the Void by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.
